briefdescription.para: Same type, different alias to emphasize "Weighted".
each class creates only once and returns shared_ptr second time. not thread safe for first run.
dtor sets invalid flag to control_point_pointers_ to prevent segfault
Returns true iff spline has knot vectors. Bezier splines donâ€™t.
Returns true iff spline is rational. NURBS is rational, for example.
Returns true iff spline is null-spline.

memberdef.argsstring: (int *degrees, std::vector< std::vector< double > > *knot_vectors, double *control_points, double *weights) const =0
memberdef.name: SplinepyCurrentProperties

briefdescription.para: Extract core spline properties. Similar to previous update_p.
Control mesh resoltuons - number of control points per para dim.
Calculate Greville abscissae for Spline (required for e.g. collocation)

parameterdescription.para: if negative two greville abscissae can be equal, positive tolerance to avoid duplication of greville abscissae. Made to comply with C^(-1) splines. Tolerance represents difference between two greville abscissae for them to be considered equal

briefdescription.para: Basis Function values and their support IDs.
